Text.p: Galactic Navy vessel designed and manufactured in government workshops, incorporating secret self-destruct services which are primed to activate when the astrogation controls are used by unfamiliar hands. Integument has chameleon properties enabling the ship to assume effective camouflage in any type of environment. Intended for reconnaissance and the transport of high-ranking military personnel from cobat it is very fast and manoeuvrable. Despite its hazardous nature it makes an ideal pirate vessel, primarily because of the speed, camouflage and high intensity Hassoni-Kruger Burst-lasers. The Asp Mk II has room for powerful shield generators, but only one missile pod.
